title: "Shahrukh's Dilwale Won't Affect Bajirao Mastani" - Deepika Padukone
content:
23 hours ago , Films of India 

Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh previously worked together in 'Ram Leela' which was superhit at the box-office. They will be seen together again in 'Bajirao Mastani'. They were here spotted launching the song 'Gajanana' from the movie. When asked about 'Dilwale' and 'Bajirao Mastani' clashing at the box-office this is what both Ranveer and Deepika had to say.
